page.title: 07TRANSPORT FOR VILLAGERS
page.content:
TODAY I ASKED PEOPLE IN CLASS 5 HOW THEY TRAVEL TO SCHOOL. 11 PEOPLE{WALK TO SCHOOL, 8 PEOPLE{CYCLE}TO SCHOOL AND 7 PEOPLE COME IN A{CAR.}THE LEAST NUMBER OF PEOPLE, 3, COME BY{BUS.
WE ALSO ASKED 30 PEOPLE, MAINLY CHILDREN, HOW THEY WOULD TRAVEL TO COLCHESTER. 14 CHILDREN AND OUR TEACHER SAID THEY WOULD TRAVEL BY CAR AND 11 PEOPLE SAID THEY WOULD GO BY TRAIN. BUS AND TAXI WERE NOT SO POPULAR,PROBABLY BECAUSE THEY ARE BOTH EXPENSIVE, BUT ONE PERSON USED EACH OF THESE METHODS. THE BUS COMPANY HAS RECENTLY INTRODUCED A SPECIAL CHEAP DAY RETURN TO COLCHESTER ON SATURDAYS, TO ENCOURAGE MORE PEOPLE TO USE THE BUSES. SURPRISINGLY ENOUGH, ONE PERSON SAID HE WOULD BIKE TO COLCHESTER. THE TRAIN SERVICE TO COLCHESTER IS MUCH BETTER THAN THE BUS SERVICE.
